topic.title: Tor: ERRNO2 : File not found: ...\control_auth_cookie. BUT IT IS THERE!!
topic.body:
The MAIN UI panel says: TOR: Error
Status: Error (ERRNO2): File not found: ...\ZeroBundle\ZeroNet\tools\tor\data\control_auth_cookie. I srsly have searched for it and it IS there. What can i do now? I have followed all instructions on how to use tor on windows w/ the torbrowserbundle, but i am still gettin this error. how can i fix it? Screenshot on imgur: http://imgur.com/fFluIpE (Could the multiple backslashes cause the issue?)

1_1CKN7ARXFNrRmDXECz9tFR3ZTpogdzPLzP.body: Thanks for the advice :) Now, it works :)
